title: Add founder attribution: Abishek

requirements.text: Display founder attribution for NEXO AI across the interface. Add a subtle 'Founded by Abishek' credit line in the sidebar below the NEXO AI wordmark, and include it in the welcome/empty-state screen shown in the chat area when no conversation is selected. Style it consistently with the existing futuristic dark theme using a muted cyan/teal accent or subdued text color.
acceptanceCriteria: The text 'Founded by Abishek' (or equivalent phrasing) appears in the sidebar below the NEXO AI wordmark
The founder credit also appears on the welcome/empty-state screen in the chat area
Styling is consistent with the existing futuristic dark theme (no jarring contrast or off-brand colors)
The founder text does not obstruct navigation or conversation list items in the sidebar

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui
Keep the founder attribution purely in the frontend â€” no backend changes required
nonGoals: Adding a dedicated 'About' page or modal
Linking the founder name to any external profile or URL
Any backend schema or data model changes
